trans-unit.resname: OE01·1★ | Because I Have Willed It | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Because I Have Willed It
trans-unit.target: Because I Have Willed It

trans-unit.resname: OE01·1★ | Because I Have Willed It | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.)
trans-unit.target: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.)

trans-unit.resname: OE01·1★ | Because I Have Willed It | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·1★ | Because I Have Willed It | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your opponents' end step, if they cast four or more spells this turn, abandon this scheme.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your opponents' end step, if they cast four or more spells this turn, abandon this scheme.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·2★ | Behold My Grandeur | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Behold My Grandeur
trans-unit.target: Behold My Grandeur

trans-unit.resname: OE01·2★ | Behold My Grandeur | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, add {U}{B}{R}.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, add {U}{B}{R}.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·2★ | Behold My Grandeur | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, if you control six or more lands, you may search your library for a card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, if you control six or more lands, you may search your library for a card with mana value 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·3★ | Bow to My Command | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bow to My Command
trans-unit.target: Bow to My Command

trans-unit.resname: OE01·3★ | Bow to My Command | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.)
trans-unit.target: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.)

trans-unit.resname: OE01·3★ | Bow to My Command | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent.
trans-unit.target: As you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·3★ | Bow to My Command | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Creatures the chosen player controls can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
trans-unit.target: Creatures the chosen player controls can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·3★ | Bow to My Command | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your opponents' end step, they may tap any number of untapped creatures they control with total power 8 or greater. If they do, abandon this scheme.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your opponents' end step, they may tap any number of untapped creatures they control with total power 8 or greater. If they do, abandon this scheme.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·4★ | Choose Your Demise | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Choose Your Demise
trans-unit.target: Choose Your Demise

trans-unit.resname: OE01·4★ | Choose Your Demise | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, look at the top four cards of your library and separate them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put the cards in that pile into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, look at the top four cards of your library and separate them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. An opponent chooses one of those piles. Put the cards in that pile into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·5★ | Delight in the Hunt | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Delight in the Hunt
trans-unit.target: Delight in the Hunt

trans-unit.resname: OE01·5★ | Delight in the Hunt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token and prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control this turn.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token and prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control this turn.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·6★ | Every Dream a Nightmare | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Every Dream a Nightmare
trans-unit.target: Every Dream a Nightmare

trans-unit.resname: OE01·6★ | Every Dream a Nightmare | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent discards a card. You draw a card for each land card discarded this way.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent discards a card. You draw a card for each land card discarded this way.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·7★ | For Each of You, a Gift | Card Name
trans-unit.source: For Each of You, a Gift
trans-unit.target: For Each of You, a Gift

trans-unit.resname: OE01·7★ | For Each of You, a Gift | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token that attacks that player each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, for each opponent, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token that attacks that player each combat if able.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·8★ | Know Evil | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Know Evil
trans-unit.target: Know Evil

trans-unit.resname: OE01·8★ | Know Evil | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, up to one target opponent can't attack with creatures, up to one target opponent can't cast creature spells, and up to one target opponent can't cast noncreature spells. You can't choose any player as a target more than once.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, until your next turn, up to one target opponent can't attack with creatures, up to one target opponent can't cast creature spells, and up to one target opponent can't cast noncreature spells. You can't choose any player as a target more than once.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·9★ | Make Yourself Useful | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Make Yourself Useful
trans-unit.target: Make Yourself Useful

trans-unit.resname: OE01·9★ | Make Yourself Useful | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy target creature an opponent controls. If a creature is destroyed this way, you gain life equal to its toughness.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, destroy target creature an opponent controls. If a creature is destroyed this way, you gain life equal to its toughness.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·10★ | The Mighty Will Fall | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Mighty Will Fall
trans-unit.target: The Mighty Will Fall

trans-unit.resname: OE01·10★ | The Mighty Will Fall | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. That player loses 7 life.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, choose an opponent with the highest life total among your opponents. That player loses 7 life.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·11★ | My Forces Are Innumerable | Card Name
trans-unit.source: My Forces Are Innumerable
trans-unit.target: My Forces Are Innumerable

trans-unit.resname: OE01·11★ | My Forces Are Innumerable | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.)
trans-unit.target: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.)

trans-unit.resname: OE01·11★ | My Forces Are Innumerable | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your end step, create a 3/3 black Horror creature token.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·11★ | My Forces Are Innumerable | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your opponents' end step, they may sacrifice two creatures. If they do, abandon this scheme.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your opponents' end step, they may sacrifice two creatures. If they do, abandon this scheme.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·12★ | My Laughter Echoes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: My Laughter Echoes
trans-unit.target: My Laughter Echoes

trans-unit.resname: OE01·12★ | My Laughter Echoes | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.)
trans-unit.target: (An ongoing scheme remains face up until it's abandoned.)

trans-unit.resname: OE01·12★ | My Laughter Echoes | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you set a non-ongoing scheme in motion, you may abandon this scheme. If you do, set that scheme in motion again.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you set a non-ongoing scheme in motion, you may abandon this scheme. If you do, set that scheme in motion again.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·13★ | No One Will Hear Your Cries | Card Name
trans-unit.source: No One Will Hear Your Cries
trans-unit.target: No One Will Hear Your Cries

trans-unit.resname: OE01·13★ | No One Will Hear Your Cries | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent chooses a creature they control, then sacrifices the rest.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent chooses a creature they control, then sacrifices the rest.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·14★ | Pay Tribute to Me | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pay Tribute to Me
trans-unit.target: Pay Tribute to Me

trans-unit.resname: OE01·14★ | Pay Tribute to Me | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control six or more lands, each opponent sacrifices another creature.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control six or more lands, each opponent sacrifices another creature.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·15★ | Power Without Equal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Power Without Equal
trans-unit.target: Power Without Equal

trans-unit.resname: OE01·15★ | Power Without Equal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, draw three cards. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn. If you control six or more lands, you may cast up to three spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, draw three cards. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn. If you control six or more lands, you may cast up to three spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·16★ | A Reckoning Approaches | Card Name
trans-unit.source: A Reckoning Approaches
trans-unit.target: A Reckoning Approaches

trans-unit.resname: OE01·16★ | A Reckoning Approaches | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, look at the top six cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, look at the top six cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·17★ | There Is No Refuge | Card Name
trans-unit.source: There Is No Refuge
trans-unit.target: There Is No Refuge

trans-unit.resname: OE01·17★ | There Is No Refuge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, it deals 3 damage to up to one target creature. Create a 3/3 black Horror creature token.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, it deals 3 damage to up to one target creature. Create a 3/3 black Horror creature token.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·18★ | This World Belongs to Me | Card Name
trans-unit.source: This World Belongs to Me
trans-unit.target: This World Belongs to Me

trans-unit.resname: OE01·18★ | This World Belongs to Me | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, draw two cards. You may play an additional land this turn.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, draw two cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·19★ | What's Yours Is Now Mine | Card Name
trans-unit.source: What's Yours Is Now Mine
trans-unit.target: What's Yours Is Now Mine

trans-unit.resname: OE01·19★ | What's Yours Is Now Mine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of target creature an opponent controls and untap it.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, gain control of target creature an opponent controls and untap it.

trans-unit.resname: OE01·20★ | When Will You Learn? | Card Name
trans-unit.source: When Will You Learn?
trans-unit.target: When Will You Learn?

trans-unit.resname: OE01·20★ | When Will You Learn? | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent exiles the top card of their library. You may cast any number of spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: When you set this scheme in motion, each opponent exiles the top card of their library. You may cast any number of spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
